meanings.definition: The process of automating a production line by implementing conveyor systems.
meanings.sent1: The conveyorization of the factory greatly increased efficiency.
meanings.sent2: Many industries have embraced conveyorization to streamline their operations.
meanings.sent3: During the conveyorization process, the robots seemed to dance with the moving belts.
meanings.sent4: The conveyorization of the warehouse turned it into a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The loud hum of conveyorization filled the entire plant.

meanings.definition: The act of converting a manual operation into an automated one using conveyors.
meanings.sent1: We witnessed the conveyorization of the assembly line last week.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in conveyorization to reduce human error.
meanings.sent3: The workers joked that the conveyorization made them feel like spectators in their own factory.
meanings.sent4: With conveyorization, the once tedious task became a breeze.
meanings.sent5: The magic of conveyorization transformed the workplace overnight.
